headers.subject: TIL: anyone figured out...

body.para: ...how to get a convenient, by-date ordered, listing of all the articles that have changed across the entire product line?

This used to "just work"-- I could visit a single location that would list all of the TIL [tech info library-- til.info.apple.com] articles that have changed in reverse date order. Incredibly handy for those of us that use numerous different apple products in our day-to-day.
However, with the update to the new look-n-feel, it seems that this feature is gone? Or was it just moved and I haven't found the new location?
